summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2749, for the improvement of 37th Avenue South from Hudson Street to Brandon Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 32800 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
